caption.title: Long term dynamic of disease outbreaks.
caption.p: (a), (b) and (c) represent the populations of infectious livestock, (d), (e) and (f) represent sizes of the infectious mosquito population in patches 1, 2 and 3, respectively. Values of parameters are the same as those used in Fig. 3. We can observe that there is a large scale of disease outbreak around every 30 years, within the festival season.
